attributes.action: allow those who were 16 before October 1st to continue to purchase tobacco legally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smokers aged 16 and 17 who are legally aloud to buy tobacco will not be able to do so after October 1st. This will cause major problems to those of this age who are already addicted. People who were aloud to legally buy tobacco before the ban comes into affect, should still be aloud to do so after the ban is in place.
